name: Get Rich or Dive Trying
description:
Get Rich Or Dive Trying is a casual treasure hunting adventure game build for the Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam.

Take to the seas as Gailbrush Deepwood as she loots sunken wrecks before high tailing it back to the docks to sell her hard won booty!  If she can raise 10,000 gold, she can retire in peace!

Controls

WASD to move the ship.

Click "Begin Dive" when over a sunken wreck to search for loot.

Recruit Crew and First Mates at the dock to speed up your progress and reduce the amount of damage you take while sailing.

HAVE FUN!

---------------------------------

NOTE:

There is only a Windows build for now but I'll make a web build very soon. Right now, I'm too tired.

I woke up and went to work then came home and did a WebGL build for all you treasure-hunting crazies.  I also found a couple of bugs while playtesting... sad... too late to fix them now.
